response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value to both of us. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $14,500. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. I believe this price reflects the quality and value of the product while providing you with a substantial savings. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 14500}
